baseline.name: Baseline
baseline.description: Default parameters - balanced capability development with moderate oversight

enhanced_AI.name: Enhanced AI
enhanced_AI.description: Boosted AI capabilities with better integration and data quality focus

high_scrutiny.name: High Scrutiny
high_scrutiny.description: Increased political oversight and ethics constraints after public concern

rapid_capability_race.name: Rapid Capability Race
rapid_capability_race.description: Ministry pressure for fast deployment; high AI push, low tolerance for delays, reduced V&V investment

post_incident_crisis.name: Post-Incident Crisis
post_incident_crisis.description: Major targeting incident occurred; trust collapsed, scrutiny spiked, compliance investment required

compliance_first.name: Compliance First (V&V Investment)
compliance_first.description: Proactive V&V and ethics investment before capability push; slower but sustainable growth

export_restricted.name: Export Control Pressure
export_restricted.description: Geopolitical tensions tighten export controls; integration slowed, allied interoperability constrained
